Dialogue.Lines: Mhuumoohoo! Mmmph! Oomuhph! Mhhhmmhp! Mmmph! Oomuhph! Mhhhmmhp! Mmmph! Oomuhph! Mhhhmmhp!

Throughout the world of Skovde you will find creatures known as... sexare. You must talk to them, befriend them, and more. WINK WINK But be careful what you say as they might get upset and leave if you say the wrong thing. Go forth and once again show this organisation the meaning of love and SAVE... US... ALL!
